comment: . Marianne Williamson , my deepest respect and aloha to you and all who have been supporting you . I'll always treasure our friendship . May God's love and blessings always be upon you . Mahalo ! Aloha .
amr:
# ::snt . Marianne Williamson , my deepest respect and aloha to you and all who have been supporting you . I'll always treasure our friendship . May God's love and blessings always be upon you . Mahalo ! Aloha .
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / say-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (a / and
                  :op1 (r / respect-01
                        :ARG0 ii
                        :ARG1 (p / person
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "Marianne"
                                    :op2 "Williamson"))
                        :ARG1-of (d / deep-02
                              :ARG2-of (h / have-degree-91
                                    :ARG1 r
                                    :ARG3 (m2 / most))))
                  :op2 (a2 / aloha
                        :beneficiary p))
            :ARG2 p)
      :snt2 (t / treasure-01
            :ARG0 (ii2 / i)
            :ARG1 (f / friendship
                  :poss (w / we))
            :time (a3 / always))
      :snt3 (w2 / wish-01
            :ARG0 ii2
            :ARG1 (a4 / and
                  :op1 (l / love-01
                        :ARG0 (p2 / person
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "God")))
                  :op2 (b / bless-01
                        :ARG0 p2)
                  :time (a5 / always))
            :ARG2 p)
      :snt4 (a6 / aloha
            :mode expressive))

comment: Sending all those best wishes right back at you , Tulsi . Many many thanks
amr:
# ::snt Sending all those best wishes right back at you , Tulsi . Many many thanks
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / say-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (s2 / send-01
                  :ARG0 ii
                  :ARG1 (w / wish-01
                        :ARG1-of (h / have-degree-91
                              :ARG2 (g / good-02
                                    :ARG1 w)
                              :ARG3 (m2 / most))
                        :mod (a / all))
                  :ARG2 (p / person
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Tulsi"))
                  :direction (b / back)
                  :mod (r / right))
            :ARG2 p)
      :snt2 (t / thank-01
            :quant (m3 / many)))
